file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 73-13-00-06 - FUEL NOZZLE ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FUEL NOZZLE ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to do the inspection of the plumbing of the primary fuel system. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PRIMARY FUEL SYSTEM PLUMBING - IN- ALL 73-13-00-200-801-A SPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 73-13-00 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 73-13-00-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PRIMARY FUEL SYSTEM PLUMBING - INSPECTION A. General (1) To do this task, refer to the instructions given in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-802-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-802-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 71-13-01-000-801-A/400 NACELLE APRON - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-13-01-400-801-A/400 APRON - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 415 LH Engine 425 RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 01 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Refer to Rolls- Royce specifica- Does the task In the engine tion EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 73-13-00 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the workstand in the work area. (2) Remove the related components: (a) Lower Cowling (AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-802-A/400). (b) Upper Cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400). (c) Nacelle Apron (AMM TASK 71-13-01-000-801-A/400). J. Primary Fuel System Plumbing - GVI SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Do a visual inspection on the plumbing of the fuel primary system. Refer to the last revision of Rolls-Royce MM, CSP 34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the related components: (a) Lower Cowling (AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-802-A/400). (b) Upper Cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400). (c) Nacelle Apron (AMM TASK 71-13-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the workstand from the work area.
